snippet: Consumers can create a collection location at no cost by signing up a home or business on our Web site. We pay the shipping, and for each pound of cigarette waste collected, we donate $1 to Keep America Beautiful.
abstract: Consumers can create a collection location at no cost by signing up a home or business on our Web site. We pay the shipping, and for each pound of cigarette waste collected, we donate $1 to Keep America Beautiful.

headline.main: A Social Business Strikes a Deal With Big Tobacco
